subject: Windows Registry Cleaner Will Make Your Computer Run Like New
body:
Improve PC Performanct with Registry Cleaner 4!






SoftwareOnline.com's Registry Cleaner 4
Fix Common, Nagging PC Problems with Ease !
With Registry Cleaner 4.0, you can easily identify and address errors in your Windows registry and get that fresh-booted feeling every time!

Download Now


Benefits Include:

Deep-scanning technology finds and fixes errors and clutter in 10 important parts of your registry.
Instantly addresses problems which cause clunky, erratic PC performance and even application instability. 
Worry-Free* recovery of system changes with clear Backup and Undo functionality.
Popular advanced user features allow you to select which part of the registry you wish to clean and improve.
Award-winning customer support.
Satisfaction GuaranteedIf you are not 100% satisfied with your Registry 
        Cleaner, simply contact us within 30 days for a full refund.


SoftwareOnline.com's Registry Cleaner 4 is fast, compact and powerful, offers one-Click* simplicity, and keeps your computer running like new.

 Get Clean!

Download Now
Free* download 1.46MB
 I tried a number of registry cleaner type programs out there. Most seemed like scams that told me I had "hundreds of critical errors", which is BS. This Registry Cleaner gave me a detailed list of what was wrong, with no hyperbole, and what it was going to do to fix it. Then it fixed it, no muss no fuss! I especially like that the Free* trial version will fix up to 20 different errors without having to buy the software, that's a nice touch. My system starts up like lightning now, just like when I first installed Windows! 
Steve Winter
